dialogueEntries.dialogue: Two hours had passed and the clock struck nine.
dialogueEntries.commands: spawn(Aoko, x, y, t1) move(Aoko, x, y, t1, t2)

dialogueEntries.dialogue: Their conversation had moved from the drawing room to the sunroom, and had manifested into the kind of scene one would not expect in such a mansion.

dialogueEntries.name: Aoko
dialogueEntries.dialogue: "To be honest, I didn't really want to leave it to Tobimaru like this."
